product.name: Motor Vehicle Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
The  proforma invoice for brand new  Motor Vehicle to be purchased,
Commercial invoice, custom declaration, packing list, evidence of custom duty payment, etc for brand new motor vehicles to be purchase.
Libre /ownership certificate
The vehicle shall meet the standard specification of the Ministry of Transport.
Motor vehicle insurance (after loan approval before disbursement)
Minimum  loading capacity for dry cargo truck is 300 quintals,
Minimum loading capacity for fuel cargo truck is 40,000 liters,
Minimum  loading capacity for public transport bus is 25 seats,
Minimum  loading Capacity for dump truck is  9m3 ,
large-, medium- and small-sized trucks, mini-buses, pickups and automobiles that are needed to facilitate the borrower's existing business.
Equity contribution of 35% or above,
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
Additional collateral may be  requested,
Tax estimation report from the concerned tax authority if the motor vehicle to be purchased is duty free.
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Motor Vehicle loan for Exporters
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
Engaged in coffee and/or sesame export business
Earned at least USD1million from the export business during the last twelve month and all of which channelled via CBE.
no credit facility with CBE shall not be eligible for truck loan financing
The vehicle shall be dry cargo truck with trailer with minimum loading capacity of 300 quintals.
The vehicle shall meet the standard specification of the Ministry of Transport.
The  proforma invoice for brand new  Motor Vehicle to be purchased,
Commercial invoice, custom declaration, packing list, evidence of custom duty payment, etc for brand new motor vehicles to be purchase.
Libre /ownership certificate
Motor vehicle insurance (after loan approval before disbursement)
Equity contribution of 20% or above,
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
Additional collateral may be  requested,
Tax estimation report from the concerned tax authority if the motor vehicle to be purchased is duty free.
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

engaged in a viable construction machinery leasing or construction business

Libre /ownership certificate

product.name: Special Construction Machinery and Dump Truck Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
Valid contracts with the Federal or Regional Governments offices and/or Public Enterprises
sub-contract agreement with principal contractor, if applicable
letter of intent from the Federal or Regional Governments offices and/or Public Enterprises which should state principal contractor has valid contract and sub-contractor is recoginized by them

shall meet the standard specification of the concerned government body
The construction machinery to be bought shall only be brand new

The  proforma invoice for brand new  construction machinery to be purchased,

Libre /ownership certificate
Motor vehicle and plant & machinery insurance (after loan approval before disbursement)

sign an undertaking to sign a tri-partite agreement with future employer and the Bank, if the current contract is terminated before full settlement of the loan

Tax estimation report from the concerned tax authority if the construction machinery to be purchased is duty free.
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Agricultural Machinery loan

shall have atleast 2hectares of agricultural land in the name of the applicant

The  proforma invoice for brand new  agricultural machinery to be purchased,

product.name: Infrastructure Construction Term Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form

Valid contracts with the Federal or Regional Governments offices and/or Public Enterprises to undertake infrastructure constructions such as universities, airports, sugar factories, and hospitals and shall present the same.
Sub-contract agreement with principal contractor, if applicable
Letter of intent from the Federal or Regional Governments offices and/or Public Enterprises which should state principal contractor has valid contract and sub-contractor is recoginized by them
Sub-contractors also shall have a valid contract at least for one year, if applicable
The Bank shall finance a maximum of 10% of the contract value.
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
A tri-partite agreement shall be signed between the Bank, the borrower and the employer
sign an undertaking to sign a tri-partite agreement with future employer and the Bank, if the current contract is terminated before full settlement of the loan
Open a Current Account, Special Proceed Account and Retention Account in the branch where the loan is to be disbursed.
Additional collateral may be  requested,
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Investment Financing for Enterprises Operating in Industrial Parks
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form

It is a term loans extended for the purpose of acquiring fixed assets such as machinery, equipment, furniture and fixtures, vehicles etc. as well as financing permanent (initial) working capital requirements.
The applicant must operate in an industrial park
The applicant shall secure the necessary permit from concerned organs to operate in an industrial park

Lease agreement for factory shade use right signed between IPDC must be presented. However, if the industry park is developed by the enterprise itself; the applicant shall present documentary evidences witnessing ownership of the park. Moreover, consent from the relevant government body allowing the enterprise to offer the developed park for bank loan mortgage must be obtained
The machinery/equipment/ vehicle to be bought shall be brand new
Equity contribution is 25% or above (for local investor), for foreing investor 40% and above.
If the Industrial Park Enterprise is also a developer of the park, the buildings /construction /civil works executed shall be considered as equity contribution
Duty-free evidence, if applicable
The  proforma invoice for brand new  machinery/equipment/vehicle to be purchased,
Commercial invoice, custom declaration, packing list, evidence of custom duty payment, etc for brand new machinery/equipment/vehicle to be purchase.
ownership certificate
plant & machinery insurance for machinery and equipment, motor vehicle insurance for vehicles (after loan approval before disbursement)
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
Additional collateral may be  requested,
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Partial Financing
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
The purpose is to expedite the recovery of the Bank's non-performing loans
Reliable source of income for the repayment of the loan

Pay minimum cash down payment of 30% of the floor price for auction value; however, in case of building or business establishment if the value of which is greater than Birr 10 million, the Bank may relax the minimum down payment requirement up to 10%
Offer the property purchased as collateral
Properties covered by the partial financing scheme are buildings, vehicles, machinery and business establishments that are either held as collateral or acquired by the Bank.
Business plan and forecasted cash flow statement
Award letter issued by the resoective bank's unit
Auction documents specifically prepared and organized for the foreclosed property
A letter from the employer if the source of repayment is salary
Recent income tax payment from the employer which shall be verified by respective tax authority
Total repayment obligation should not exceed one third of his/her salary that has to be confirmed by a letter from the employer
The Bank may consider the salary of the spouse when the borrowers want to borrow jointly

Sign an undertaking to submit the business license and TIN soon after the purchased property is transferred if the applicant is new to the business and the source of repayment is the purchased property.
Additional collateral may be requested
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Syndicate Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
Provided by and shared between the CBE and other financers due to the volume of the fund.
The purpose is to finance medium or long-term investment ventures that demand a large amount of funding together with other financers
Used to acquire fixed assets and may also incorporate a working capital for the project under consideration
Co-financing agreement by the banks that promised to engage in the joint financing of a venture
Detailed project feasibility study and business plan
Equity contribution which will be requested if the loan request is accepted by the bank
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Additional collateral may be requested
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Agricultural Input Term Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
The Regional State President shall sign on the loan application letter and present MOFEC guarantee if the applicat is regional state
If the applicant is a cooperative, associations or unions
legal personality from the concerned governmental organ
Minutes of a resolution on the credit request passed by at least three-fourths of the members of the General Assembly or as per their memorandum and/or articles of association
at least one year business experience with a good business track record
a document (LHC & rent agreement) that confirms acquiring or renting basic infrastructure, such as appropriate office and store (working premises)
evidence of employment for emloying a professional Manager and an Accountant/Bookkeeper
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Commercial Farming Term Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
a minimum of 30 hectares of agricultural land; however, high value crops (e.g., vegetables, fruits, etc.) farm may be entertained regardless of the size of the land
Is given for entities engaged in modern commercial farms or agro-processing industries for working capital and/or acquiring/leasing/constructing fixed assets
Priority is given to modern commercial agriculture ventures that produce for export market
The land holding/lease right shall be binding until the tenure of the loan period plus two years
present a letter from Woreda or Zone or Ministry of Agriculture regarding suitability of the weather and soil for production of the specified products
both rain fed and irrigation system farming may be financed,
present a permission letter to use the nearby river/water fall/ for irrigation purpose from the concerned government organ in case of irrigation farming
land holding certificate and/or site plan
land lease agreement
lease payment receipt of the current period
project feasibility study
Equity contribution of 35% or above for new or expansion agricultural farming projects
If additional collateral is offered, the equity contribution shall be lowered to 20% in proportionate to the value of the collateral
In case of project expansion, the investment already undertaken by the promoter's own finance can be considered as equity contribution after valued by the Bank's valuator
Water test report by the independt body if the irrigation is from borehole

If the loan request involves civil works, the applicant shall provide design, specification and bill of quantities for farm infrastructure (buildings, constructions (irrigatin system, water pond, etc)
Professional license for the BOQ document
Both softcopy and scanned hardcopy of BOQ and feasibility study is required
Proof of evidence if the crop is planted before customer lease agreement (for perennial crops)
Purchase invoices for fruit seed purchased for perenial crops
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Ba

product.name: Cotton Farm term loan financing Against DBE's Guarantee
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
a short-term loan granted to cotton producers
The maximum repayment period is one year
a minimum of 30 hectares of land for cotton growing
Present bona-fide order from local buyers (textile or processing industries)
Provide a document that authorizes the use of land by way of renting or any other legally acceptable arrangement
If the cotton farm is found in Afar Regional State, an agreement signed with tribal chief or Clan leader/s and registered by the concerned organ
Payment receipt for the rent or lease payment for the current (due) period
Present sales receipt for one year from textile industries/ginners or documentary evidence about receipt of cotton export proceeds from local bank/s
Business plan and forecasted cash flow statement
Additional collateral may be requested
Tri-partite agreement must be signed between the Bank, the borrower and the processing or textile industry buying the cotton produce to channel sales proceed through the Bank
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Micro-Finance Institution's Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
It is a short–to medium term loan
Legally registered with the NBE
Authorization certificate from NBE that certify to operate as MFI
Meet all relevant policy and Directives of NBE
Evidence of a high quality loan portfolio, saving mobilization, loan-approval system, loan recovery performance and other relevant performance indices
Business plan and forecasted cash flow statement
Offer acceptable collateral comparable to the requested loan amount
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Channel Financing
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
short-term loan rendered to potential credit customers recommended by existing CBE's prominent customers
CBE's prominent customer shall act as guarantor
The application is lodged by potential customers
Present purchase order and current sales contract
affiliated companies, associates or subsidiaries are not eligible
letter of consent and recommendation from guarantor
The guarantor shall provide personal and/or corporate guarantee to the Bank on behalf of the borrower
payment track record and level of purchases/sales for the past r/n ship from guarantor
Business plan and forecasted cash flow statement
Additional collateral may be requested
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Urban Utilities Financing
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
A short to medium-term loan

Granted for entities engaged in  supplying urban utilities such as dry and liquid waste management, abattoirs, public ambulance services, firefighting, street lighting, road asphalt and pavement works, sanitation, roadside public latrine service, and development of city parks
Fulfills all legal requirements
Feasibility study and/or business plan
Offer acceptable collateral comparable to the requested loan amount
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Consulting Firm Financing
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
A short-term loan
Granted for business professionals engaged in rendering professional services such as Engineering, ICT, Law, Accountancy, Management, Architecture, Art, etc.
Valid professional license from the concerned government body
A minimum of one-year experience
Business plan and forecasted cash flow statement
Offer acceptable collateral comparable to the requested loan amount
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Inter-Bank Lending
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
a short-term loan
a minimum of two years experience in banking busines
present document that confirms the fulfillment of the minimum reserve, provision, liquidity and other requirement of the NBE

Business plan and forecasted cash flow statement
Additional collateral may be requested
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Idea Financing

Credit application form

a minimum of Bachelor's degree in the field related to the investment to be made
distinct technology know-how and/or accumulated experience and knowledge

product.name: Import Letter of Credit Settlement Loan

Granted to convert the outstanding import letter of credit document's value to either a merchandise loan facility or a term loan for a maximum period of one year.
granted to existing high value customers of the Bank

Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

Credit application form
extended for the purchase of capital goods, construction of buildings related with the factory and working capital

product.name: Real Estate Development loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
Renewed professional license for the contractor/s employed
Land holding certificate issued by appropriate gov., organ
Lease agreement
lease payment receipt for the current (due) period

Present proven track records like location/site, property construction status, no. of floors per building, type and size of the house including value/selling price and sales progress/status, intended purpose, current condition, etc.
Present sales receipt for one year per each site together with construction status and sales progress report
Financing structure at current status per each site/location such as amount from own source, realized/unearned revenue, bank borrowings, construction status, etc

Project feasibility study and/or Business plan

Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Construction loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form

Land holding certificate issued by appropriate gov., organ, if applicable
Lease agreement, if applicable

Certificate of testimony for the completed projects from the employer

Summarized table for the company's engagement in similar project with project status including %completion, project cost, amount executed, remaining project cost, site taking over date, project completion date, etc.

Letter of intent from the project owner that will support the contractor to get finance for the intended propose with justified reason and express its consent to get into tri-partite agreement in the process of loan repayment when deemed necessary (for gov. owned projects).
Construction status or % completion of under construction projects from the employer for which the loan is requested.
Letter from concerned gov., organ for installation of power, water and other required infrastructure with respective costs shall be disclosed, if applicable.
Project feasibility study and/or Business plan

Authorization letter to deduct loan processing fee from the account opened in the name of the company by specifying the account number & list of accounts the company has at CBE.
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Medium and long term loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Fulfill general elibility criteria and complete/update customer information
Credit application letter
Credit application form
Equity Contribution of 30% or above the project cost,
Environmental impact assessment approved by respective gov., organ
Machine specification & machine operation manual from the manufacturer, if applicable

Hotel and tourism
Health and pharmaceuticals etc

Assessment made for the particular species of livestock/poultary/seed regarding their productivity by ministry of agriculture, if applicable
At least three proforma invoice for the to-be-purchased fixed assets, if applicable

Commercial invoice and custom declaration (if any) for aleady purchased fixed asset of the project, if applicable.
Offer acceptable collateral comparable to the requested loan amount
Tax estimation report from the concerned tax authority if the collateral to be seized is duty free.
Detailed Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
Present documents/information demanded by the bank

product.name: Export term loan

Credit application form

Present documents/information demanded by the bank

product.name: Infrastructure Construction Term Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form

Valid contracts with the Federal or Regional Governments offices and/or Public Enterprises to undertake infrastructure constructions such as universities, airports, sugar factories, and hospitals and shall present the same.
Sub-contract agreement with principal contractor, if applicable
Letter of intent from the Federal or Regional Governments offices and/or Public Enterprises which should state principal contractor has valid contract and sub-contractor is recoginized by them
Sub-contractors also shall have a valid contract at least for one year, if applicable
The Bank shall finance a maximum of 10% of the contract value.
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
A tri-partite agreement shall be signed between the Bank, the borrower and the employer
sign an undertaking to sign a tri-partite agreement with future employer and the Bank, if the current contract is terminated before full settlement of the loan
Open a Current Account, Special Proceed Account and Retention Account in the branch where the loan is to be disbursed.
Additional collateral may be  requested,
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Investment Financing for Enterprises Operating in Industrial Parks
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form

It is a term loans extended for the purpose of acquiring fixed assets such as machinery, equipment, furniture and fixtures, vehicles etc. as well as financing permanent (initial) working capital requirements.
The applicant must operate in an industrial park
The applicant shall secure the necessary permit from concerned organs to operate in an industrial park

Lease agreement for factory shade use right signed between IPDC must be presented. However, if the industry park is developed by the enterprise itself; the applicant shall present documentary evidences witnessing ownership of the park. Moreover, consent from the relevant government body allowing the enterprise to offer the developed park for bank loan mortgage must be obtained
The machinery/equipment/ vehicle to be bought shall be brand new
Equity contribution is 25% or above (for local investor), for foreing investor 40% and above.
If the Industrial Park Enterprise is also a developer of the park, the buildings /construction /civil works executed shall be considered as equity contribution
Duty-free evidence, if applicable
The  proforma invoice for brand new  machinery/equipment/vehicle to be purchased,
Commercial invoice, custom declaration, packing list, evidence of custom duty payment, etc for brand new machinery/equipment/vehicle to be purchase.
ownership certificate
plant & machinery insurance for machinery and equipment, motor vehicle insurance for vehicles (after loan approval before disbursement)
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Project feasibility study and/or business plan,
Additional collateral may be  requested,
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,

product.name: Syndicate Loan
specificEligibilityCriteria: Credit application letter
Credit application form
Provided by and shared between the CBE and other financers due to the volume of the fund.
The purpose is to finance medium or long-term investment ventures that demand a large amount of funding together with other financers
Used to acquire fixed assets and may also incorporate a working capital for the project under consideration
Co-financing agreement by the banks that promised to engage in the joint financing of a venture
Detailed project feasibility study and business plan
Equity contribution which will be requested if the loan request is accepted by the bank
Bank financing, or any other type of borrowing, is not acceptable as a source of fund for the borrower's equity contribution.
Additional collateral may be requested
Present all the documents/information demanded by the Bank,
